title: Honeymoon celebrations in Monaco
text:
Other Articles Adam Lambert has `no beef` with Demi Lovato, Nick Jonas How childhood trauma affects sexual well-being Vegetative patients show glimmers of awareness Monaco is one of the most romantic honeymoon destinations in Europe. It is a tiny strip bounded by the French Riviera to the west and nestling under the foothills of the Alps. This luxurious haven is blessed with 300 days of sunshine, making it one of the top choices for honeymoon.
It offers a magnificent honeymoon with the picturesque views, romantic abundance and stupendous landscapes. If you are in mood for indulgence, extravagance and opulence, Monaco is one of the perfect destinations. On offer are plush accommodations, gastronomy delights, historical museums and attractions, fashion and lifestyle and renowned casino options. Ninety per cent of the hotels are four stars or more. It is a complete package of fun and entertainment.
This luxurious haven is blessed with 300 days of sunshine, making it one of the top choices for honeymoon
Honeymoon is an once-in-a-lifetime experience and everyone tries to make it the best. To add memorable moments to the romantic getaway, Monaco offers several sightseeing attractions and panoramic views like the Oceanographic museum and aquarium, the Jardin Exotique, Avenue Saint-Martin, the Prince’s Palace, and the Japanese garden.
Monaco gratifies honeymooners as an idyllic place to spend the first few days of marital bliss. Add some fun and entertainment to a trip laced with romance and love by trying your luck at the world’s famous Casino Monte-Carlo. Music and romance are synonymous to each other. And a romantic journey is incomplete without adding some foot tapping or soothing music to it. The couples on their honeymoon can enjoy the classic ballet and opera concerts which are organised round the year. Monaco has more than 700 events in a year.
The principality is a paradise for shopping lovers with greatest names in the fashion and lifestyle industry. The newly-weds can put their hand on brands like Hermès, Céline, Christian Dior, Saint Laurent Rive Gauche, Louis Vuitton, Gucci, Chanel, Prada, Ichthys and more.
The country is well connected via flights, helicopter, train and even by road. In Monaco a honeymoon is a luxurious retreat with dollops of surprises and experiences making the journey a memory for lifetime. The country also boasts of its Michelin star restaurants and best in the world spa treatments.
